channel.title: professional American football club on Logotyp.us
channel.description: Recent content in professional American football club on Logotyp.us

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Kiel Baltic Hurricanes Logo The Kiel Baltic Hurricanes are an American football team based in Kiel, Germany. The club has been, of recent, a strong force in the sport in Germany, playing in five consecutive German Bowls from 2008 to 2012, losing the first two, winning the third, and losing the fourth and fifth. The club is part of the American Sports Club Kiel e.V. Source
You can download theBaltic Hurricaneslogo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: Baltic Hurricanes
item.description: The Kiel Baltic Hurricanes are an American football team based in Kiel, Germany. The club has been, of recent, a strong force in the sport in Germany, playing in five consecutive German Bowls from 2008 to 2012, losing the first two, winning the third, and losing the fourth and fifth. The club is part of the American Sports Club Kiel e.V. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Cologne Crocodiles Logo
The Cologne Crocodiles are an American football team from Cologne, Germany. The club’s greatest success came in 2000, when it won the German Bowl for the first and, so far, only time. Prior to this, the club had made five losing appearances in the championship game, stretching from 1982 to 1997. The club, a long-term member of the German Football League, became insolvent in 2003, folded and reformed. For a number of years after that it operated a youth department before fielding a senior team once more beginning in 2009.
You can download theCologne Crocodileslogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Cologne Crocodiles
item.description: The Cologne Crocodiles are an American football team from Cologne, Germany. The club’s greatest success came in 2000, when it won the German Bowl for the first and, so far, only time. Prior to this, the club had made five losing appearances in the championship game, stretching from 1982 to 1997. The club, a long-term member of the German Football League, became insolvent in 2003, folded and reformed. For a number of years after that it operated a youth department before fielding a senior team once more beginning in 2009.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Dresden Monarchs Logo
The Dresden Monarchs are an American football team from Dresden, Germany. They have been a member of the first tier German Football League since 2002 and play in its Northern Division. They are the reigning champion after having won German Bowl XLII. The club reached the German Bowl for the first time in 2013, where it lost to the Braunschweig Lions by a single point. The 2021 season saw their first division title in the first tier German Football League when they placed first in the North Division with a record of nine victories, one defeat in the regular season.
You can download theDresden Monarchslogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Dresden Monarchs
item.description: The Dresden Monarchs are an American football team from Dresden, Germany. They have been a member of the first tier German Football League since 2002 and play in its Northern Division. They are the reigning champion after having won German Bowl XLII. The club reached the German Bowl for the first time in 2013, where it lost to the Braunschweig Lions by a single point. The 2021 season saw their first division title in the first tier German Football League when they placed first in the North Division with a record of nine victories, one defeat in the regular season.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 Düsseldorf Panther Logo
The Düsseldorf Panther are an American football team from Düsseldorf, Germany. The club is the oldest extant American football club in Europe, having been formed on 1 May 1978. The Panthers are one of the most successful American football clubs in Germany, having won six German Bowls as well as becoming the first-ever German team to win the Eurobowl in 1995. Having won its 15th Junior Bowl in 2010, the club has the most successful youth department in the sport in Germany.
You can download theDusseldorf Pantherlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Dusseldorf Panther
item.description: The Düsseldorf Panther are an American football team from Düsseldorf, Germany. The club is the oldest extant American football club in Europe, having been formed on 1 May 1978. The Panthers are one of the most successful American football clubs in Germany, having won six German Bowls as well as becoming the first-ever German team to win the Eurobowl in 1995. Having won its 15th Junior Bowl in 2010, the club has the most successful youth department in the sport in Germany.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Frankfurt Universe Logo
The Frankfurt Universe are a German American football team from Frankfurt, Hesse. The club, formed in 2007, won promotion to the German Football League 2, the second tier of league football in Germany, in 2011. The team rebranded itself as “Frankfurt Galaxy” ahead of the 2015 season and won promotion to the first division German Football League Süd at the end of this season. It was renamed again as Frankfurt Universe in 2016.
You can download theFrankfurt Universelogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Frankfurt Universe
item.description: The Frankfurt Universe are a German American football team from Frankfurt, Hesse. The club, formed in 2007, won promotion to the German Football League 2, the second tier of league football in Germany, in 2011. The team rebranded itself as “Frankfurt Galaxy” ahead of the 2015 season and won promotion to the first division German Football League Süd at the end of this season. It was renamed again as Frankfurt Universe in 2016.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 Schwäbisch Hall Unicorns Logo
The Schwäbisch Hall Unicorns are an American football team from Schwäbisch Hall, Germany. The club’s greatest successes were winning the southern division title in the German Football League in 2009 and in every season played since 2011, and participated in every German Bowl held between 2011 and 2021 - except for 2013 and the 2020 season which was cancelled due to Covid-19, winning the title four times: in 2011, 2012, 2017 and in 2018.
You can download theHall Unicornslogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Hall Unicorns
item.description: The Schwäbisch Hall Unicorns are an American football team from Schwäbisch Hall, Germany. The club’s greatest successes were winning the southern division title in the German Football League in 2009 and in every season played since 2011, and participated in every German Bowl held between 2011 and 2021 - except for 2013 and the 2020 season which was cancelled due to Covid-19, winning the title four times: in 2011, 2012, 2017 and in 2018.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Marburg Mercenaries Logo The Marburg Mercenaries are an American football team from Marburg, Germany. Internationally, the club’s greatest success came in 2005, when it won the EFAF Cup, followed by a losing appearance in the Eurobowl in 2007. Domestically, the team’s greatest achievement was to reach the 2006 German Bowl, where the team lost to the Braunschweig Lions. Source
You can download theMarburg Mercenarieslogo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: Marburg Mercenaries
item.description: The Marburg Mercenaries are an American football team from Marburg, Germany. Internationally, the club’s greatest success came in 2005, when it won the EFAF Cup, followed by a losing appearance in the Eurobowl in 2007. Domestically, the team’s greatest achievement was to reach the 2006 German Bowl, where the team lost to the Braunschweig Lions. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Munich Cowboys Logo
The Munich Cowboys are an American football team based in Munich, Germany. The club, together with the Düsseldorf Panther and the Ansbach Grizzlies, is one of the oldest in Germany. The team refers to itself as The Grand Old Team of the South. The club has one national championship to its name, winning the German Bowl in 1993. As of 2015, the club has played more GFL games than any other team, 405, followed by the Berlin Adler with 378, one of only three other teams with more than 300 league games.
You can download theMunich Cowboyslogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Munich Cowboys
item.description: The Munich Cowboys are an American football team based in Munich, Germany. The club, together with the Düsseldorf Panther and the Ansbach Grizzlies, is one of the oldest in Germany. The team refers to itself as The Grand Old Team of the South. The club has one national championship to its name, winning the German Bowl in 1993. As of 2015, the club has played more GFL games than any other team, 405, followed by the Berlin Adler with 378, one of only three other teams with more than 300 league games.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
New Yorker Lions Logo
The New Yorker Lions are an American Football team from Braunschweig, Germany. Until late 2010, the team was known as the Braunschweig Lions. Under this name, the Lions became the most successful American football club in Germany, winning seven German Bowls as well as two Eurobowls. From 1997 to 2008, the team played in twelve consecutive German Bowls. After a number of less successful years the club won four more German titles from 2013 to 2016 as well as four more Eurobowls from 2015 to 2018.
You can download theNew Yorker Lionslogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: New Yorker Lions
item.description: The New Yorker Lions are an American Football team from Braunschweig, Germany. Until late 2010, the team was known as the Braunschweig Lions. Under this name, the Lions became the most successful American football club in Germany, winning seven German Bowls as well as two Eurobowls. From 1997 to 2008, the team played in twelve consecutive German Bowls. After a number of less successful years the club won four more German titles from 2013 to 2016 as well as four more Eurobowls from 2015 to 2018.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Potsdam Royals Logo The Potsdam Royals are an American football team from Potsdam, Germany. The club’s greatest achievement is winning the championship in the last Eurobowl against the Amsterdam Crusaders just a year after they entered the German Football League, the top tier American Football league in Germany. Source
You can download thePotsdam Royalslogo on full-version of the page. ]] >
